column1: Priorities for 2014Tuesday, February 18, 2014Dear Friend,With the beginning of the Second Session of the 113th Congress, I'd like to hear your thoughts on some of the big issuesfacing our nation.
I hope you'llcomplete this brief surveyand tell mewhat issues Congress should prioritize and work together on to tackle this year.
Additionally, I invite you to stay in touch with me throughFacebookandTwitter ,and to sign up to receive mye-newsletters .
You'll be able to get the latest updates on my work on the CentralCoast and in Washington—and give me your thoughts on current topics.
Thank you for taking the time to share your views.

Sincerely,Lois CappsMEMBER OF CONGRESSOffice LocationsWashington, DC2231 Rayburn HOBWashington, DC, 20515Phone: (202) 225-3601Fax:(202) 225-5632San Luis Obispo1411 Marsh St, Ste 205San Luis Obispo, CA 93401Phone: 805) 546-8348Fax:(805) 546-8368Santa Barbara301 E.
